name: Huusuienbu - Chapter Spring and Summer
description:
RTS+TD+ADV
You can enjoy real time strategy battle and adventure mode with simple operation.

This is early access version which offers Vol.1 and Vol.2 will be offered free in the coming updates!
Various changes is going to be made in the updates, including mission objectives, which will bring you a totally different feeling for the gameplay!

Game process:
1.adventure mode
2.move map etc…
3.battle mode

※more mode
Cooking mode
Challenge mode

Please refer to the help document if you have any questions in controlling.

===Worldview===

Once upon a time, there was wind and water.
Wind blew, water flowed.
Then came flame, metal, wood and earth.
Earth flew, wood grew, flame burned, metal founded.
Then the whole world came into being.
